EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners (1343166377.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners (1343166377.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Gary, Some time ago you requested information regarding the services offered by MBO Partners. Now might not be the right time for you. You may find some of the resources we develop specifically designed for independent consultants helpful for you: - Recorded Independent Consulting Webinar Index <http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index> - Reports on Independent Consulting in America <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/> - Independent Consulting Brief Monthly <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief> Any update would be great, you may simply reply to this email. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Tuesday, July 17, 2012 2:47 PM To: 'gary@moshierstudio.com' Subject: MBO Partners Dear Gary, Thank you for requesting more information from MBO Partners. I look forward to speaking with you about our services, if you prefer you can book a time to chat using my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfFBLrGd75O%2BRK6z%2FjCHVfpGn9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. As a courtesy, I’ll also be reaching out to you through the number you provided. Below you’ll find the links to information you requested: - You’re copy of the consulting rate guide is broken out into three calculation methods which are hyperlinked from our table of contents which you can access by clicking here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/files/pdfs/mbo-bill-rate-resource-guide.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfFBLrGd75O%2BRK6z%2FjCHVfpGn9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. - Short 2 minute video <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfFBLrGd75O%2BRK6z%2FjCHVfpGn9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> on MBO. Look forward to speaking with you soon, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfFBLrGd75O%2BRK6z%2FjCHVfpGn9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfFBLrGd75O%2BRK6z%2FjCHVfpGn9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
